meanings.definition: To control or operate by automation.
meanings.sent1: The machine automates the assembly line, making it work without human help.
meanings.sent2: The software automates the data entry process, saving time and reducing errors.
meanings.sent3: The robot automates the task of sorting mail, pretending to be a diligent postman.
meanings.sent4: The smart home system automates the lights, as if they have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent5: The program automates the repetitive task, like a tireless assistant always ready to help.

meanings.definition: To convert a process or task into an automatic operation.
meanings.sent1: She automates the sprinkler system to water the garden every morning.
meanings.sent2: The company automates the billing process to streamline their operations.
meanings.sent3: He automates the coffee maker to start brewing when he snoozes the alarm.
meanings.sent4: The timer automates the lights to turn on at dusk, creating a welcoming glow.
meanings.sent5: The app automates the reminders, ensuring nothing is forgotten or overlooked.
